relation: Great for these types of students
Excellent beginners and advance classes available.
Students how know or feel the call of God on their lives.
Fun day and picnics and field trips.

Several Options, for before evening classes, however, available throughout the day on campus. These facilities are closed after 8:00pm. Notwithstanding there are several food stops in and around the vicinity.
As with many colleges it is easy to join the slackers, but stay focus and remember that execellence requires sacrifice. 4

Ensure to go over your options with a councellor, and be honest about your goals and objectives. This will assist the councellor to better guide you and ensure that your choice of students is best suited to guide you into your God given purpose.

The teachers are anionted and focus on biblical views while exposing to the different views which exist on the subject matter. This better prepares the student to go into the field and to share his or her faith. The college experience is spiritual, educational, influencial, and motivating towards the students God given purpose.
